64a8eb5b-aa6a-45d0-922a-daadb4904d68:::||@!@||:::2025-09-22T01:56:53:::||@!@||:::{"id":"64a8eb5b-aa6a-45d0-922a-daadb4904d68","title":{"zh":"牛仔漫畫"},"altTitles":[{"zh-hk":"My Boy 牛仔"},{"en":"My Boy"},{"zh-hk":"Ow chië"},{"zh-ro":"Niou chië"},{"en":"Cow boy"},{"zh-ro":"Nioe Qië"},{"zh":"My boy 午介"},{"zh":"午介"},{"en":"father and son cartoon"},{"zh-hk":"Niúzăi"}],"lastChapter":"2772","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en","zh-hk"],"description":{"en":"Cowboy is a four-panel comic series drawn by Hong Kong cartoonist Wong Sima in the 1970s and early 1980s. The comic was originally serialized in the supplement of Ming Pao for many years and was later compiled and published as a book by Boyi Publishing Group Co., Ltd. The complete set of Cowboy consists of 41 volumes, telling the life fragments and interesting stories between the two fathers, Cowboy and \"father\", in the comic. It describes the appearance of a well-off family in Hong Kong at that time and also shows the innocence of Cowboy and his affection for his father. The prototypes of Cowboy and father cartoon are the author Wong Sima and his three sons.","zh":"《牛仔》是香港的漫画家王司马在1970－1980年代初所画的四格漫画系列。漫画原本在《明报》副刊连载多年，后由博益出版集团有限公司结集成书出版。牛仔全套41册，讲述了漫画中「牛仔」和「契爷」两父子之间的生活片段和趣事，描述了当时香港小康之家的面貌，也表现出牛仔的天真烂漫以及和爸爸的亲情。牛仔与契爷的原型来自作者王司马与他的三名儿子。","zh-hk":"《牛仔》是香港的漫畫家王司馬在1970－1980年代初所畫的四格漫畫系列。漫畫原本在《明報》副刊連載多年，後由博益出版集團有限公司結集成書出版。牛仔全套41冊，講述了漫畫中「牛仔」和「契爺」兩父子之間的生活片段和趣事，描述了當時香港小康之家的面貌，也表現出牛仔的天真爛漫以及和爸爸的親情。牛仔與契爺的原型來自作者王司馬與他的三名兒子。"},"originalLanguage":"zh-hk","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"0a39b5a1-b235-4886-a747-1d05d216532d","name":{"en":"Award Winning"}},{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"a1f53773-c69a-4ce5-8cab-fffcd90b1565","name":{"en":"Magic"}},{"id":"b11fda93-8f1d-4bef-b2ed-8803d3733170","name":{"en":"4-Koma"}},{"id":"caaa44eb-cd40-4177-b930-79d3ef2afe87","name":{"en":"School Life"}}]}

Rika saw her own life in his tragic story. So, she decides to raise him to become a \"villain\" who will stand up to the hero and heroine. She figured, if the world is this unfair, then she might as well just break the world itself! But there's a problem. The original Lydia in the novel used to bully Orlando. 652993ef-a511-4f69-b343-e731f3edbbc4:::||@!@||:::2025-09-29T01:51:56:::||@!@||:::{"id":"652993ef-a511-4f69-b343-e731f3edbbc4","title":{"ko-ro":"An Boin eun Tumyeongchu"},"altTitles":[{"ko":"안 보이는 투명츄"},{"ja":"透明になった童貞くん〜拾った猫はサキュバスだった!?〜"},{"en":"The Skill of Being Unseen"},{"it":"L'abilità di non essere visti"},{"en":"An Invisible Kiss"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["it"],"description":{"en":"The extremely hideous Joonyoung finds himself duped into an unfair contract with a mischievous succubus.\n\nTo survive, he must seduce women, a daunting task for someone like him.\nHowever, he’s granted a unique superpower to aid in his mission: the ability to become invisible!\n\nWith this newfound skill, Joonyoung navigates a world of unseen opportunities and challenges, all while trying to outsmart the supernatural forces at play.\n\nCan he master the art of invisibility and turn the odds in his favor, or will the succubus's game prove too dangerous?\n\n(Source: MangaUpdates)","it":"L'orribile Joonyoung si ritrova intrappolato in un contratto ingiusto con una succube dispettosa. Con questa nuova abilità, Joonyoung si muove in un mondo di opportunità e sfide invisibili, cercando di superare in astuzia le forze soprannaturali in gioco. Riuscirà a padroneggiare l'arte dell'invisibilità e volgere le probabilità a suo favore, o il gioco della succube si rivelerà troppo pericoloso?"},"links":{"ap":"the-skill-of-being-unseen","engtl":"https://www.lezhinus.com/en/comic/unseenskill?utm_source=mangadex\u0026utm_campaign=md_official_eng_btn","mal":"170242","mu":"u2djpbs","raw":"https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/invisible_chu?utm_source=mangadex\u0026utm_campaign=md_official_raw_btn"},"originalLanguage":"ko","contentRating":"pornographic","tags":[{"id":"39730448-9a5f-48a2-85b0-a70db87b1233","name":{"en":"Demons"}},{"id":"3e2b8dae-350e-4ab8-a8ce-016e844b9f0d","name":{"en":"Long Strip"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"aafb99c1-7f60-43fa-b75f-fc9502ce29c7","name":{"en":"Harem"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"eabc5b4c-6aff-42f3-b657-3e90cbd00b75","name":{"en":"Supernatural"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}}]}

One snowy day, while on a boring outing as instructed by his parents, Sosuke came across a dying girl lying on the side of the road. On a whim, Sosuke saved the girl from being kidnapped by a homeless man, but the girl he saved showed no gratitude or fear; she simply remained expressionless.\n\n\"I wonder what her face will look like if I make her cry.\"\n\nDriven by a twisted curiosity, Sosuke took the girl home and began to educate her himself. Before long, the girl grew into such an accomplished attendant that she became the talk of the town. This is a romantic story that begins with the twisted relationship between an arrogant master and an expressionless orphan.\n\n(Source: forcs, translated)","ja":"は、名家の御曹司だが性格がクズの加賀良惣介と、彼に拾われた少女の物語。ある雪の日、退屈していた惣介は道端に転がる死にかけの少女と出会う。気まぐれに彼女を助けたが、少女の顔には恐怖も救われたことへの感謝も見えず、そんな少女を泣かせてみたいという歪んだ欲望が惣介の中に沸き立つ。ただ虐めて泣かすのでは面白くないと少女の世話をしてやり、ひょんなことから彼女を教育することに。やがて成長し、巷で噂になるほど優秀な補佐となった少女と惣介の関係が描かれる。"},"links":{"al":"199983","mu":"lsh3rc2","raw":"https://www.cmoa.jp/title/336387/vol/3/"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shoujo","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}}]}

Made by the fans, for the fans. \n\nDisclaimer: This is a non-profit, transformative fan project drawn and written by @genericpuff. All Lore Olympus-relevant character designs and branding belong to Rachel Smythe. All interpretations of Greek characters, mythologies, and themes are purely fictional and should not be used in any factual sourcing when researching Ancient Greek material."},"links":{"engtl":"https://namicomi.com/en/title/ygbpch2q/lore-rekindled"},"originalLanguage":"en","contentRating":"suggestive","tags":[{"id":"3e2b8dae-350e-4ab8-a8ce-016e844b9f0d","name":{"en":"Long Strip"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"891cf039-b895-47f0-9229-bef4c96eccd4","name":{"en":"Self-Published"}},{"id":"a1f53773-c69a-4ce5-8cab-fffcd90b1565","name":{"en":"Magic"}},{"id":"caaa44eb-cd40-4177-b930-79d3ef2afe87","name":{"en":"School Life"}},{"id":"e197df38-d0e7-43b5-9b09-2842d0c326dd","name":{"en":"Web Comic"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}},{"id":"f8f62932-27da-4fe4-8ee1-6779a8c5edba","name":{"en":"Tragedy"}}]}

115cdd84-a068-4bd5-bfd7-439d94e6fb91:::||@!@||:::2025-09-29T01:52:22:::||@!@||:::{"id":"115cdd84-a068-4bd5-bfd7-439d94e6fb91","title":{"en":"Thus, She Married That Monster Twice"},"altTitles":[{"ko":"그렇게, 그 괴물과 두 번 결혼했다"},{"en":"Two Times Tied to the Devil"},{"en":"I Married the Monster Twice"},{"vi":"Hai lần kết hôn với quái vật"},{"ru":"И вот так я дважды стала женой монстра"}],"description":{"en":"“Did you come here to save me?”\n\nIt was a question so naïve it was almost laughable—yet within it lay her final hope. But the man, wearing an expression full of disgust, replied: “Of course not. I came here to drag you into hell.”\n\nIn his first life, Giscard Lodbrok cast Diana Brien into hell.\n\n“You have to endure me. Just three years… that’s all. I won’t hold back for those three years. You’ll have to take all of my emotions.”\n\n—I know.\n\nThat’s why I’m doing this now.\n\nDiana nodded dryly, while the man lowered his head, whispering brokenly into her embrace, “Damn it… Then why did you abandon me?”\n\nIn his second life, Giscard Lodbrok fell into hell because of Diana Brien.","ko":"“나를 구해주러 온 거니?”\n\n가증스러울 정도의 순진한 물음이었으나, 거기엔 마지막 희망이 담겨있었다.\n그러나, 남자는 혐오스럽다는 표정을 지으며 말했다.\n\n“설마요.”\n“…….”\n“당신을 지옥으로 빠트리기 위해 온 겁니다.”\n\n첫 번째 생, 기스카르 로드브로크는 다이애나 브리엔을 지옥으로 빠트렸다.\n\n***\n\n“당신은 나를 견뎌야 해.”\n“…….”\n“겨우, 겨우 3년이라고…….”\n“…….”\n“난 그 3년 동안, 참지 않을 거야. 내 모든 감정을 받아줘야 해.”\n“…….”\n\n알고 있어. 그래서 지금 이 짓을 하는 거잖아. 다이애나가 건조하게 고개를 끄덕였다.\n남자가 고개를 숙이며 그녀의 품에 흐느끼듯 낮게 속삭였다.\n\n“제기랄, 그러니 나를 왜 버렸어…….”\n\n두 번째 생, 기스카르 로드브로크는 다이애나 브리엔 때문에 지옥에 빠졌다.","ru":"– Ты пришёл спасти меня?\n\nНевероятно наивный и почти что смешной вопрос, в котором чувствовалась её последняя надежда.\n\nМужчина, с отвращением на лице, ответил:\n\n– Конечно, нет.\n\n– …\n\n– Я прибыл сюда, чтобы низвергнуть тебя в ад.\n\nВ первой жизни Гискард Лодброк превратил жизнь Дианы Бриенн в ад.\n\n– Тебе придётся терпеть меня.\n\n– …\n\n– Всего лишь три года…\n\n– …\n\n– Я не буду сдерживаться всё это время. Тебе придется прочувствовать всё то, что чувствовал я.\n\n– …\n\n– Знаю, поэтому и соглашаюсь.\n\nДиана коротко кивнула, пока мужчина, опустив голову, сломано шептал ей:\n\n– Чёрт… Почему ты бросила меня?\n\nВо второй жизни Гискард Лодброк сам оказался в аду из-за Дианы Бриенн."},"links":{"ap":"i-married-the-monster-twice","mu":"zwulif8","nu":"thus-she-married-that-monster-twice","raw":"https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list.nhn?titleId=841816"},"originalLanguage":"ko","contentRating":"suggestive","tags":[{"id":"3e2b8dae-350e-4ab8-a8ce-016e844b9f0d","name":{"en":"Long Strip"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}},{"id":"f8f62932-27da-4fe4-8ee1-6779a8c5edba","name":{"en":"Tragedy"}}]}

Why? Because in a world where a popular RPG has come to life, he keeps dying miserably over and over again as a pathetic villainous noble. Such a disgraceful end is unworthy of a proud aristocrat. He may only be twelve years old, but age doesn't matter. He is determined to do whatever it takes to avoid his tragic fate.\n\nHe takes down the corrupt official who started it all, eases the heavy taxes on his people, and continues to slay the monsters that ravage his domain. As he does, a hidden power that never appeared in the game begins to awaken. For some reason, the commoners begin to praise him, but he declares, \"Don't misunderstand me, commoners. 04dde695-713e-4384-9feb-4120bb223de9:::||@!@||:::2025-10-20T01:59:48:::||@!@||:::{"id":"04dde695-713e-4384-9feb-4120bb223de9","title":{"en":"World Is Dancing"},"altTitles":[{"en":"The World Is Dancing"},{"ja":"ワールド イズ ダンシング"}],"description":{"en":"Born into a life of acting and dance with a traveling theater troupe in 14th-century Japan, 12-year old Oniyasha has one problem-he doesn't know what the point of any of it is. Why must I step with the left foot here instead of the right? Why is one performance good and another, bad? Why do people dance at all? It all seems perfectly arbitrary, until a chance encounter in a run-down shack sets him down a path to revolutionizing the art form and influencing much of Japanese culture to come. A fictionalized account of the early life of Zeami Motokiyo (Oniyasha), the founder of modern Noh theater-the world's oldest surviving theater art-this coming-of-age artist's journey vividly brings to life a man far ahead of his time during one of Japan's most culturally and socially vibrant eras."},"links":{"ap":"world-is-dancing","mal":"147400"},"originalLanguage":"ja","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}}]}

b15c9c2a-5d37-4d06-b7ca-33bf18482a40:::||@!@||:::2025-10-20T01:59:48:::||@!@||:::{"id":"b15c9c2a-5d37-4d06-b7ca-33bf18482a40","title":{"ja-ro":"Oshi no Teki ni Natta node"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"推しの敵になったので@COMIC"},{"en":"I Became My Favorite's Enemy"},{"id":"Aku Menjadi Musuh Idola Favoritku"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["id"],"description":{"en":"A hundred years have passed since women began to awaken supernatural powers or \"Lux\", turning society into a place where men are looked down upon. Ibuki is a rookie member of the evil organization known as \"Nega Messiah (Vow of Salvation)\". Despite being a man, he has a Lux called \"Separation\". His true identity? A normal person reincarnated into the world of his favorite manga. But even before his reincarnation, he was a huge fan of Hinata, a member of the organization of justice \"Prim Libra (White Scales of Order)\".\n\nSo, the battlefield between good and evil to him was nothing but \"the very forefront of his idol-worshipping activities\"! Sometimes, he would act as Hinata's reliable older childhood friend, other times he would become her rival from the enemy organization. Ibuki enjoyed wallowing in his selfishness, having a life filled with battle together with his favorite, but things that didn't occur in the manga started happening...? I, my favorite's enemy, will protect her future! The thrill of this opportunity does not last long, since the label “accidental national team” weighs heavily on his mind. At his assigned lodging, Yeo-jun meets Nam Ji-hoon, the strongest short track skater of the moment and his long-time secret crush. Ji-hoon seems unusually interested in him, and Yeo-jun quickly finds himself swept up in his orbit. With her stunning beauty and exceptional talents, many admire her—yet she rejects all advances with an icy attitude. Minato, however, has little interest in romance due to personal reasons. Even though Rei sits next to him in class and works part-time at the same café, he pays her no special attention. One day, Minato stumbles upon Rei in a back alley, quarreling with a persistent man he recognizes as a customer who had been turned down by her at the café. Acting on impulse, he steps in to help. d415ee90-68bd-44f5-9129-82770b20f31f:::||@!@||:::2025-10-20T01:59:50:::||@!@||:::{"id":"d415ee90-68bd-44f5-9129-82770b20f31f","title":{"en":"10 Nengo ni Sukuwareru Mob desu ga, 10 Nenkan mo Shiitagerareru Nante Iya nano de Ima sugu Nigedashimasu"},"altTitles":[{"en":"I'm a mob that can be saved in 10 years, but I refuse to be held back for 10 years. I'm running away right now."},{"pt-br":"Sou uma multidão que pode ser salva em dez anos, mas me recuso a ficar presa por dez anos, então estou fugindo agora mesmo"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["pt-br"],"description":{"en":"Young Countess Lilyjen, overcome with grief at the death of her mother, is suddenly flooded with memories of a past life. She realizes that she has been reborn into the world of her favorite novel, one she knew by heart, complete with a setting book, collection of illustrations, and even an anime adaptation. But as she settles in, Lilyjen discovers something shocking: in this world, she is not the heroine... but the heroine's half-sister (mob!)! Memories of the plot flash through her mind like a kaleidoscope, and the fate that awaits her is cruel—to be rejected by her own family, to end up responsible for a noble house in decline and a sick and ruined father.  ———Unacceptable! Among them exists a sacred bond known as the fated mate, a partner chosen not by reason, but by instinct and the pull of their very souls.\n\nEmily, a former lady-in-waiting of the royal princess, has left the palace behind to begin a new chapter of her life. But her quiet days are shattered when she encounters Elvio, the cold, and feared aide of the royal chancellor and a dragonkin. For unknown reasons, the man everyone dreads treat her with an almost frightening gentleness… then one day, he sinks his fangs into the back of her hand, an act of courtship, marking her as his mate.\n\nA love that feels too tender to be real, an affection far too one-sided to trust— Is it genuine feeling, or is there something hidden beneath? As confusion and longing intertwine, Emily slowly begins to see what lies in his eyes is not mere love, but something far deeper. An unshakable bond born of destiny, obsession, and a dragon’s first love.\n\n---\n**Original Web Serialization:** [CMOA](https://www.cmoa.jp/title/338086/), [Pixiv Comic](https://comic.pixiv.net/store/products/2012645), [Renta!](https://renta.papy.co.jp/renta/sc/frm/item/415645/)","ja":"「君こそが僕の“番”だ」\nここは、竜族と人族が共存するアヴィリクタ王国。\n国の発展を陰で支えてきた竜族は、人族を遥かに凌ぐ力と叡智を持った尊き種族。\n彼らには、本能が導く「運命の番（つがい）」という定められた伴侶がいる。\nそれは理屈ではなく魂が惹かれ合い、出会うべくして出会う、竜族にだけ与えられた特別な絆――\n\n王宮を離れ、新たな人生を歩もうとしていた元王女付き侍女・エミリ。\n彼女の前に現れたのは冷徹宰相補佐官と呼ばれる竜族・エルヴィオ。\n誰もが恐れるその男はなぜかエミリに優しく微笑み、手の甲に牙を立てた――\nそれは竜族にとっての求愛、そして“番”として選んだ証だった。\n\n自分にだけ向けられる異様なほどの優しさ、あまりにも一方的な好意―\nそれは本心か、それとも何か裏があるのか…―\n戸惑いながらも、エミリは次第に気づいていく。\n彼の瞳に宿るのは、“恋”では済まされない、もっと深く重い何か――\nすれ違いと謎を孕む、異種族間の“運命の絆”。\nそれは、愛すべきただ一人を選んだ竜族の、抗えぬ執着と初恋の物語。"},"links":{"mu":"ejzz3hy","raw":"https://www.cmoa.jp/title/338086/"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"josei","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}}]}

Having never even laid eyes on a female of his kind, he’s been forced into a lifelong virgin existence. Now entering his first heat, driven nearly mad by the urge to breed, he hears a secret rumor: A male wildcat can perfectly impregnate a human man—without fail. Determined to find the most beautiful and intelligent man to carry his child, Yumin sneaks into Hanguk University.\nThere, he meets Beom Taejun, a man with stunning looks and an irresistibly luscious body. To mate with the proud Taejun, Yumin throws aside his wildcat pride and desperately courts him.\n\n*“Go Yumin… ha… you’re driving me crazy.”*  \n*“No—ah…!”*\n\nBut before he knows it, Yumin finds himself pinned down on Taejun’s bed, being ravished. Wait—what?! I’m the one who’s supposed to be the pregnant one?! Tepat saat ia memasuki masa birahi pertamanya dan akan menjadi gila dengan naluri berkembang biak, ia menemukan rumor rahasia: “Kucing liar jantan sangat cocok dengan manusia dan dapat menghamili mereka tanpa gagal.” Bertekad untuk mendapatkan pasangan yang paling cantik dan cemerlang, Yu-min menyelinap ke Universitas Korea—di mana ia bertemu Beom Tae-jun, seorang pria dengan penampilan yang mencolok dan fisik yang tak tertahankan. Leintia holds her head, thinking, This is completely over for me... after he wordlessly walked away.\n\n—However, the next day, a shocking single phrase flew from Isaac's mouth. \"Lady Leintia has become my reason for living.\" ...Wait, why did it turn out like that?!\n\nNow the curtain rises on a completely unexpected romance!","ja":"令嬢リーンティアは、ある日突然、前世の記憶を取り戻す。\nここは一度だけ遊んだ乙女ゲームの世界──しかも自分はバッドエンド確定の悪役令嬢！？\n\n破滅回避のため、王子との婚約をなんとか断ち切ろうとお見合いラッシュに挑むリーンティア。\nそんな彼女の前に現れたのは、気だるげでやる気ゼロな公爵令息・イサーク。\n「楽しいことなんて……ないかな」なんて言う彼を、まさかのハプニングで川に突き落としてしまった！\n\n無言で帰ってしまった彼に、これは完全に詰んだ…と頭を抱えるリーンティア。\n──ところが翌日、イサークの口から飛び出したのは衝撃のひと言。\n\n「リーンティア嬢が、生きる楽しみになりました」\n\n…いや、なんでそうなるの！？\nこうして予想外すぎる恋が幕を開ける──！"},"links":{"raw":"https://comic.pixiv.net/works/12458"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shoujo","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"0bc90acb-ccc1-44ca-a34a-b9f3a73259d0","name":{"en":"Reincarnation"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"ace04997-f6bd-436e-b261-779182193d3d","name":{"en":"Isekai"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"d14322ac-4d6f-4e9b-afd9-629d5f4d8a41","name":{"en":"Villainess"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}}]}
